data.eml:eml: New records of the East-Asian Nemoura species (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) for South of the Russian Far East with description of the larvae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Teslenko, Valentina A. (2016): New records of the East-Asian Nemoura species (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) for South of the Russian Far East with description of the larvae. Zootaxa 4085 (4): 575-588, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4085.4.7
